---
title: "Assess compliance"
date: last-modified
---

To provide an unbiased starting point that enables more efficient discussions between validators and developers, you assess compliance with guidelines based on analyzing evidence and findings.

## Prerequisites

- You hold the `Validator` role ^1^
- The model you are documenting is registered in the model inventory^2^
- A model developer has marked their model documentation as **Ready for Validation**^3^

::: {.column-margin}
**Learn more:**

^1^ [Users (Supported roles)](/guide/configuration/onboarding-users.qmd#supported-roles)

|   [Manage users (User roles)](/guide/configuration/manage-users.qmd#user-roles)

^2^ [Register models in the inventory](/guide/model-inventory/register-models-in-model-inventory.qmd)

^3^ [Submit for approval](/guide/model-documentation/submit-for-approval.qmd)
:::
